metadata.title: CVE-2019-2126 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In ParseContentEncodingEntry of mkvparser.cc, there is a possible doublefree due to a missing reset of a freed pointer. This could lead to remotecode execution with no additional execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions:Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9.Android ID: A-127702368.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-2126` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx6 - 1.8.1-2
vpx-tools - 1.8.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
aom package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
godot package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
libvpx package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.1-2').
